nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. East southeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Rain Showers
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 5pm. Mostly sunny. High near 73, with temperatures falling to around 71 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
